column5: As some of you might have read in a previous post of mine I just bought a Shimano convergence 10ft rod for steelheading...now I need a reel for it and I would like to keep it around the $100 or less is possable...anyone have any suggestions?
Daiwa whisker 1300 size, specially if you can find one still made in Japan.
shimano sahara . 79.99 plus $20. mail in rebate   pretty good deal on a decent reel
Pflueger Supreme or President you will be very surprised
